attributes.action: Olympic tickets to be printed in US
attributes.additional_details:
Full Disclosure of the process, procurement and decision making process for the award of Olympic ticket tender to be printed outside of the UK.

The British printing industry is one of the most excellent, innovative and creative in the world and yet it struggles to beat price and competition from external competitors.
The British printing industry is the world’s fifth largest producer of printed products employing some 140,000 people in 10,500 companies, and it is one of the most environmentally friendly printing markets in the word, and yet you seem not to be able to find one British printer capable of providing your tickets.
